title: Top 10 ES6 Features You Must Know
description: we will explore the essential ES6 features that every developer should be familiar with. These features enhance code readability, maintainability, and overall productivity, making ES6 a must-know for modern web developers.
author: Hamza Sohail

title: JavaScript Objects for Absolute Beginners: A Fun Introduction
description: JavaScript has evolved significantly over the years. With the introduction of ECMAScript 6 (ES6), developers gained access to a host of new features and improvements that have transformed the way JavaScript code is written and maintained.
author: Sajal Ali

title: Component lifecycle in React — Class component vs Functional component
description: Class components provide lifecycle methods like componentDidMount, componentDidUpdate, and componentWillUnmount. Functional components achieve similar functionality using the useEffect hook, which can handle side effects and lifecycle events in a unified API
author: Feroze Khan

title: Free images and resources collection for website
description: If you desire to have a website background that showcases the ripples of a river through SVG or blob, wave, gradients, low poly, or gradient effects, and customise it according to your preferences, then waste no time and head straight to this link. Take the reins and generate a background with river-like patterns that perfectly align with your own vision.
author: Anmol Baloch
